smtpClient.name: Smtp Client
smtpClient.description: The SMTP address for the e-mail client.

smtpPort.name: Smtp Port
smtpPort.description: The port the SMTP server listens on.

fromAddress.name: From Address
fromAddress.description: The e-mail address the SMTP server is configured for.

smtpPassword.name: Smtp Password
smtpPassword.description: The password of the SMTP server.

submitProofSubject.name: Submit Proof Subject
submitProofSubject.description: The subject line of the e-mail sent to the customer when a job proof has been submitted.

appSettings.submitProofSubject: Job ID {0}: {1} - Job Proof Available for Review

submitProofBody.name: Submit Proof Body
submitProofBody.description: The body of the e-mail sent to the customer when a job proof has been submitted.

appSettings.submitProofBody:
Hello from Brentwood Printing,
A sample image for your print job has been uploaded. Please login at http://www.brentwoodprinting.com/ and review this item.
Thank You.

quoteSubject.name: Quote Subject
quoteSubject.description: The subject line of the e-mail sent to the customer when a job has been quoted.

quoteBody.name: Quote Body
quoteBody.description: The body of the e-mail sent to the customer when a job has been quoted.

appSettings.quoteBody:
Hello from Brentwood Printing,
A job you recently submitted has been quoted. Please login to http://www.brentwoodprinting.com/ to view and accept the quote.
Thank you.

moreInfoSubject.name: Request More Info Subject
moreInfoSubject.description: The subject line of the email sent to the customer when a job requires more information.

appSettings.moreInfoSubject: Job ID [Job ID]: [Job Name] - Request For More Information
appSettings.moreInfoBodyStart:
Hello from Brentwood Printing.
A request has been made for more information regarding your print job:
appSettings.moreInfoBodyEnd:
Please reply to this e-mail with the missing details for this job, or login and add the details reqiured to the job.
Thank You.

daysPastDue.name: Days Before Invoice Past Due
daysPastDue.description: The number of days before an invoice is considered past due. ENSURE ONLY NUMBERS ARE PUT IN HERE.

outstandingSubject.name: Outstanding Invoices E-Mail Subject
outstandingSubject.description: The subject line of the e-mail sent to the customer when an invoice is past due.

outstandingBody.name: Outstanding Invoices E-Mail Body
outstandingBody.description: The body of the e-mail sent to the customer when an invoice is past due.

appSettings.outstandingBody: Please be advised that you have an outstanding invoice. Please login to http://www.brentwoodprinting.com/ and resolve this issue. Thank you!

completedSubject.name: Completed Job Subject
completedSubject.description: The subject line of the e-mail sent to the customer when a job has been set to completed

appSettings.completedSubject:
Hello from Brentwood Printing;
Your job [Job ID] has been completed! You may come by and pick it up, or if you opted for delivery, it will be sent to you within the next few days!
